    • Method Detail

      • place

        public processing.core.PVector place(Word w,
                            int rank,
                            int count,
                            int ww,
                            int wh,
                            int fw,
                            int fh)
        Description copied from interface: WordPlacer
        Where should this Word be drawn on the field?
        Specified by:
        place in interface WordPlacer
        Parameters:
        w - The Word to place. A typical WordPlacer might use the Word's weight.
        rank - The index (rank) of the Word to place. Since this isn't a property of the Word, it's passed in as well.
        count - The total number of words. Gives a context to wordIndex: "Word {wordIndex} of {wordsCount}".
        ww - The width of the word image.
        wh - The height of the word image.
        fw - The width of the field.
        fh - The height of the field.
        Returns:
        the desired location for a Word on the field, as a 2D PVector.

      • nudgeFor

        public processing.core.PVector nudgeFor(Word word,
                               int attempt)
        Description copied from interface: WordNudger
        How should this word be nudged, this time?
        Specified by:
        nudgeFor in interface WordNudger
        Parameters:
        word - the word to nudge
        attempt - how many times WordCram has tried to place this word; starts at zero, and ends at (int)((1.0-word.weight) * 600) + 100
        Returns:
        the PVector to add to the word's desired location, to get the next spot to try fitting the word
